title: PTI Outperforms opposition parties in 2nd phase of KP’s local bodies polls: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, March, 31 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Thursday said the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) had outperformed all the opposition parties in the second phase of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa’s local bodies election.
He, in a tweet, said the Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam was far behind the PTI in the contest while Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz was completely wiped out.
Fawad thanked the Almighty for the lead taken by the PTI in the LG election, which he said, predicted the future.
